it.polimi.ingsw.ClientView

Class ObserverView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.ClientView.ObserverView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ObserverView
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Observer
    This class is the main client CLI view responsible for displaying the main menù and allowing the player to create new matches. This main view will also spawn in a new thread the correct view to display to the user based on updates received from the server about changes in the state.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
